alert.note: Alert for Northern St. Lawrence; Southwestern St. Lawrence (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 07 at 5:47PM EDT by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central St. Lawrence County through 630 PM EDT... At 547 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Edwardsville, moving north at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Ogdensburg, Heuvelton, and De Peyster. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Northern St. Lawrence; Southwestern St. Lawrence
